channel.title: nkotibha on QUANTUM INFORMATION WITH TRAPPED IONS
channel.description: Recent content in nkotibha on QUANTUM INFORMATION WITH TRAPPED IONS

item.title: Dr. Nikhil Kotibhaskar
item.description: Nikhil wrote his thesis on programmable XY simulations, precise optical sensing, and building a segmented ‘blade’ ion trap for quantum simulation. Previously, he co-developed a ‘four-rod’ ion trap for his MSc thesis in the same group. Nikhil holds an undergraduate degree in Mechatronics from Sastra University in India and worked in the ion trapping lab at the Indian Institute of Science (IISc).
